project_name: Eth Transport â€“ Decentralized Civic Infrastructure on Filecoin
filecoin_growth_impact:
The Eth Transport (Transport DAO) project has directly contributed to the growth of the Filecoin economy by enabling real-world, FIL-denominated workflows, promoting developer adoption, and fostering ecosystem interoperability across civic and mobility domains.

Our suite of developer tools, deployed on Filecoin EVM (FVM) and integrated through Storacha, Filecoin and IPFS, powers verifiable incident reporting, billing, and data storage across civic and enterprise pilots. The system supports FIL-based smart contract payments, data archiving, and on-chain DAO coordination.

Transaction Volume: Our tools have supported Filecoin payments in recurring activity through linked workflows such as billing, subscription payments, and civic data storage [1].

Community Testing & FVM Contribution: We actively enabled community testing of deploying mobility smart contracts on FVM, providing early feedback on burner bridge issues and address compatibility (ff1â€“f4 formats) on MetaMask. These contributions were positively received by the FIL-B engineering team, helping refine developer onboarding and tooling stability for FVM users. Please visit https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/17P13sh8Hv179FsGhqCxGMiV-I1GpxV99?usp=drive_link . We have also expanded awareness of Filecoin On-chain cloud, Synapse SDK and decentralized identity models in government contexts. Please visit https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_jC0BHwzQ4c

Early Adopters of Filecoin Eco-system Innovations: We are early adopters of the Federated Learning initiative led by py-libp2p contributors, leveraging Akave as a decentralized storage layer for privacy-preserving data collaboration. We are also early adopters of the ETHâ€“FIL Swap product using the 1inch Fusion+ SDK, reinforcing Filecoinâ€™s interoperability with Ethereum. Please visit https://incident-dapp-filecoin.vercel.app/  & https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hgClO4wZ7iw 

Ecosystem Growth: By connecting Filecoinâ€™s decentralized storage with IoT and mobility applications, Eth Transport expands the Filecoin economy into new domains like smart cities, transport analytics, and government collaboration, driving sustained FIL-denominated use cases.

Our goal remains to make Filecoin a trusted backbone for civic and enterprise data infrastructure, creating real economic activity while improving developer experience and interoperability across the Filecoin stack.

[1] Earnings share in Filfox bulk transactions: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Ziey1FyD1IFW4k9xJwTlkZwRq8TJvPG7?usp=drive_link
description:
Eth Transport has evolved from a Filecoin Microgrant project into a production-grade decentralized incident management and civic coordination suite. 

Between November 2024 and September 2025, it integrated Storacha & UCANs, and piloted the use of cross chain bridges with Celo & Self Protocol, Kadena and Hedera with Storacha storage protocol, and Filecoin warm storage with Synapse SDK  to enable blockchain-verified road incident reporting, civic data management, and DAO-based coordination for public authorities.

The project demonstrates Filecoinâ€™s strength as a trust anchor for government and public infrastructure. Deployed in collaboration with industry partners like  Logix Junction &  MACQ, Code for Gov Tech & NSUT, Government of NCT of Delhi; it enables citizens, police, and mobility officers to create and verify on-chain records backed by decentralized storage. The open-source modules have become reference implementations for civic data DAOs and real-world Filecoin adoption.
additional_impact:
Eth Transport demonstrates how Filecoin and IPFS can underpin transparent, civic-grade infrastructure for cities worldwide. It has:

Encouraged cross-protocol interoperability (Filecoin â†” Storacha â†” Celo). Please visit https://incident-dapp-filecoin.vercel.app/  & https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hgClO4wZ7iw 

Expanded awareness of Filecoin On-chain cloud, Synapse SDK and decentralized identity models in government contexts. Please visit https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_jC0BHwzQ4c

Enabled the development of accessible road safety tools (with contributions from differently abled developers): please visit demo and screenshots from FVM Speech Tools (https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1MDhe4283YENBRQV5lLtcoAS5F8wKILLr?usp=drive_link)

Advanced open mobility datasets for academic research and public use. Please visit https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1miVjRm7o0FVcQwK8cIvJJ3lwHOYhBGex?usp=drive_link 

By making public data verifiable, modular, and citizen-owned, Eth Transport extends Filecoinâ€™s mission of building public-good infrastructure for humanityâ€™s information.
end_user:
Eth Transport benefits a diverse ecosystem spanning civic authorities, public institutions, researchers, and Web3 developers building on the Filecoin stack.

Civic Stakeholders â€“ City and traffic authorities, police departments, and urban planners use the platform to record, verify, and coordinate road incident data through Filecoin-powered storage and IPFS-verified records.

Educational & Research Institutions â€“ Government universities such as NSUT (Delhi) use Eth Transport as a learning and deployment tool for training engineers in FEVM, decentralized data storage, and on-chain governance and cross chain interoperability using Celo, Kadena, Hedera with Storacha hot storage layer.

Industry Collaborators â€“ Organizations like MACQ, ZF Mobility , NXP Semiconductors, and Tech Swarm (India) leverage Eth Transportâ€™s data DAO modules, UAV monitor stack, and interoperability bridges with Storacha for real-world deployments.

Developers & Data Engineers â€“ Through open APIs, SDKs, and FEVM integrations, developers across the Filecoin ecosystem use Eth Transport to build civic tools, automate data pipelines, and explore cross-chain workflows with Ethereum, Celo & Self Protocol, Hedera, Chainlink, Polygon, Kadena and Optimism.

Together, these users form a connected civic-tech and developer ecosystem using Filecoin as a foundational layer for transparency, accountability, and verifiable data sharing in urban mobility.
testimonials:

C4GT mentors and PLDG Stewards for advancing decentralized governance pilots.

NSUT (Delhi Government) for real-world testing in academicâ€“government collaboration.

Storacha and OrbitDB maintainers for bridging decentralized storage with live civic data streams.

Moralis Hackathon jury recognized Eth Transport with Filecoin, Fluence, XMTP, and Ledger prizes for applied innovation.

top_five_dependents:
Our Filecoin-based developer tooling and data infrastructure have been adopted in multiple applied research and industry collaborations, resulting in real-world deployments and integrations.

Tech Swarm (Government of India â€“ Drone-as-a-Service Platform)
 Integrated our Filecoin data storage and audit layer for autonomous UAVs on Filecoin, Optimism & Ethereum. Used for telemetry and compliance reporting.

Logix Junction (India) â€“ Connected Vehicle Analytics
 Built on Eth Transportâ€™s Storacha bridge to visualize 15,000+ trip records across 45+ trucks using PowerBI, R, and FIL Calc dataDAO.

NXP Semiconductors & Intel oneAPI â€“ IoT Node Commissioning Gateway
 Leveraged our Filecoin Warm Storage tooling for off-chain authentication and on-chain node verification. Presented at VLSID 2025.

MACQ & Transport Intel (Startup India SEED Fund collaboration with NSUT IIF)
 Early-stage PoC for blockchain-based transport incident prevention using Filecoin for verifiable storage and auditability.

NSUT IIF, Incubation Center (Delhi) â€“ Developer Enablement Program
 Used our tools to onboard IoT and blockchain engineers to Filecoin and Optimism stacks, fostering academicâ€“industry collaboration.

Please visit https://docs.google.com/document/d/16Oyuu9XRvzYMdBT291fiqpzq8wuxWEk_G-dxltsSANQ/edit?usp=sharing for more details on each of these projects.

filecoin_users_percentage_using_project:
Our implementation contributes to a growing subset of Filecoin ecosystem developers and civic-data applications through integrations with Storacha, universal connectivity dapp & quic protocol in py-libp2p, and Filecoin EVM smart contracts.

While our tooling is not core to Filecoin node operations, it is being actively adopted by projects leveraging Filecoin for data storage, verifiable recordkeeping, and DAO-based analytics.
Estimated 50+ active Filecoin-based DApp and tooling developers have interacted with our open repositories, Storacha modules, or tutorials.

Approximately 10+ Filecoin-powered civic or IoT data pilots [1] (tracked via GitHub interactions, C4GT, and ecosystem workshops) have integrated our APIs or file storage templates.

Our integrations indirectly support multiple Filecoin ecosystem projects through shared infrastructure dependencies.

Together, this positions Eth Transport as a developer-facing infrastructure layer within the Filecoin ecosystemâ€”bridging civic data, IoT workflows, and verifiable document storage on decentralized systems.

References

[1] Pilot Projects using Eth Transport: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1xeQlXwGlpwDwFymzbXM7NzoCPqm1QhFL?usp=drive_link
